attributes.action: Increase NHS Funding from National Lottery
attributes.additional_details: The current COVID-19 crisis has shown that our NHS has some issues with lack of funding and for a 12 month period any money raised by the National Lottery should be directed towards supporting our health service even if this takes money from good causes for a 12 month period. This should be in addition to central government funding.
attributes.background: Use lottery funding for a 12 month period to support the NHS
